item.title: How do u make an object open a shop
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:10, topic:82296”]yea thats right, it looks like it uses cases, so you may have to go with object id, im not good with cases, but yea you would add a new case,

case ####://(object id here)
wanneshop = ##;//shop id
break;

im not sure if i spelled the wanneshop var right…
oh hmm if you wanted it to be one object and not every object with that id then it would be easy, just like this

case ####://(object id here)
if (objectX == #### && objectY == ####){
wanneshop = ##;//shop id
}
break;
[/code][/quote]

nah it would be like this

[code]case 197://(4723)
Wanneshop = 57;// random shop
break;

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make an object open a shop

item.title: How do u make an object open a shop
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

yea thats right, it looks like it uses cases, so you may have to go with object id, im not good with cases, but yea you would add a new case,

case ####://(object id here)
wanneshop = ##;//shop id
break;

im not sure if i spelled the wanneshop var right…
oh hmm if you wanted it to be one object and not every object with that id then it would be easy, just like this

case ####://(object id here)
if (objectX == #### && objectY == ####){
wanneshop = ##;//shop id
}
break;

you would, of course, add that right after another ones break, like…

case 2878:   // Mage Arena Bank Pool
teleportToX = 2509;
teleportToY = 4689;
break;
<---------------here

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make an object open a shop

item.title: How do u make an object open a shop
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

is this a good example lol

if (objectX == 2816) { // Members gate to brimhaven ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, -3); }

if thats right i have to add it under that aye lol

thats from this bit here

[code]case 1597:
if (objectX == 2816) { // Members gate to brimhaven
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, -3);
}
else if(objectX == 3008) {
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, -2);
}
else {
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, 0);
}
break;

case 2878: // Mage Arena Bank Pool
teleportToX = 2509;
teleportToY = 4689;
break;

case 2879: // Mage Arena Staff Place Pool
teleportToX = 2542;
teleportToY = 4718;
break;[/code]

Read full topic
